name: 0-99 (Skarbiec)
overview: Skarbiec is a set of three programs (Dysk - Soft, Videozaurus - Rex, Mini Syntetyzer) and one bonus game (0-99). The game 0-99 is a simple guesswork played on a board with 100 numbered fields (from 0 to 99). The players choose one of the numbers and receives a hint in the form of digitized phrase, such as "too much", "too low", "far too much". Number of attempts are the result of player - the lower the better.
